ch.epfl.lis.wingj

Class WJStructureViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.WJStructureViewer

  • public class WJStructureViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Displays a Structure object (+ information overlay) on top of an image.
    Version:
    Ocotber 21, 2012
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)
